member.summary: A base class for all Hawaii service agent classes. These agents are wrapping the communication tasks specific to each service. ServiceAgent provides functionality common to all these clases.

member.summary: The http request object.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceAgent class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceAgent class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent`1.ProcessRequest(Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent{`0}.OnCompleteDelegate)
member.summary: This method initiates the asynchronous service call.
member.param: The on complete" callback that will be invoked after the service call completes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent`1.DeserializeResponse``1(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes the response stream.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent`1.DeserializeResponseJson``1(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes the response stream using JSON serializer.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent`1.GetPostData
member.summary: This method must be implemented by all classes that inherit from ServiceAgent. It will provide the POST data that has to be sent to the service if the Http Method used is POST.
member.returns: Returns the POST data in byte array format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent`1.ParseOutput(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method is called after the response sent by the server is received by the client. It allows classes that inherit from ServiceAgent to do their own processing of the data received from the server.
member.param: The response stream containing response data that is received from the server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ServiceAgent`1.OnCompleteRequest
member.summary: A virtual method. It is invoked after completing the service request. The implementation of this base class will invoke the client's "on complete" callback method. Classes that inherit from ServiceAgent can oveerite this method to further process the service call result before calling the client's "on complete" callback method.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Hawaii.ClientLibraryUtils
member.summary: A class to store utility functions used by the client libraries.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ClientLibraryUtils.LookupServiceScopeFromConfig(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks for service scope.
member.param: The config file path to look for.
The default value to return if the config file does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ClientLibraryUtils.LookupHostNameFromConfig(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks for service host name.
member.param: The config file path to look for.
The default value to return if the config file does not exist.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Hawaii.ClientLibraryUtils.LookupConfigFromFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The function is used on a desktop client to allow override of defautl service path. It looks for settings within specified file. If it does not exist, it returns the default. The [SecurityCritical] sttribute is needed due to CA2140 analysis rules.
member.param: The config file path to look for.
The default value to return if the config file does not exist.
member.returns: The config value specified in the config file, if present. The default otherwise.
